meanings.definition: Deprived of a right or privilege
meanings.sent1: The disentitled man felt sad without his ticket to the show.
meanings.sent2: She was disentitled to enter the exclusive club without a membership.
meanings.sent3: The disentitled puppy couldn't join the fun playdate.
meanings.sent4: The disentitled student watched others receive awards with envy.
meanings.sent5: Being disentitled made him feel left out and unimportant.

meanings.sent1: The disentitled child couldn't have any dessert after misbehaving.
meanings.sent2: Without a valid ID, she was disentitled to receive the discount.
meanings.sent3: The disentitled squirrel tried to sneak into the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The disentitled flower wilted without sunlight or water.
meanings.sent5: Feeling disentitled to love, she closed her heart to others.
